trapomino

Class Tetromino

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.Tetromino

  • public class Tetromino
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will manage the class variables for the Tetromino blocks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Position[] positions 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tetromino()
      This constructor constructs a new Tetromino which is a series of 4 different blocks.
      Tetromino(int x, int y, Grid grid, Grid.SHAPE type)
      This constructor constructs a new Tetromino which is a series of 4 different blocks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBlocksToGrid()
      This method adds the blocks back to the Grid after Grid checking is complete.
      Grid getGrid()
      This method returns the Grid the Tetromino is placed in.
      java.util.ArrayList<Position> getPositions()
      This method returns the Positions the Tetromino occupies in the Grid.
      Grid.SHAPE getShape()
      This method returns the shape of the Tetromino.
      int getX()
      This method returns the X coordinate of the Tetromino in the Grid.
      int getY()
      This method returns the Y coordinate of the Tetromino in the Grid.
      boolean moveCheck(Position[] newPositions, int xMovement, int yMovement)
      This method checks whether or not the Tetromino can move to the given new Positions in the Grid.
      boolean moveDown()
      This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space down in the Grid.
      boolean moveLeft()
      This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space left in the Grid.
      boolean moveRight()
      This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space right in the Grid.
      void removeBlocksFromGrid()
      This method temporarily removes the blocks from the Grid for Grid checking purposes.
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This method renders the Tetromino's sprite on the frame.
      void rotate()
      This method rotates the Tetromino's Positions in the grid based on which orientation it has.

    • Field Detail

      • positions

        public Position[] positions

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tetromino

        public Tetromino(int x,
                 int y,
                 Grid grid,
                 Grid.SHAPE type)
        This constructor constructs a new Tetromino which is a series of 4 different blocks. Each Tetromino must exist within a grid and will be assigned its variables from the given variables.
        Parameters:
        x - - the X coordinate of the Tetromino in the Grid
        y - - the Y coordinate of the Tetrominos in the Grid
        grid - - the Grid the Tetromino exists in
        type - - the Shape of the Tetromino

      • Tetromino

        public Tetromino()
        This constructor constructs a new Tetromino which is a series of 4 different blocks. Each Tetromino must exist within a grid and its variables will be assigned as random accepted values.

    • Method Detail

        public int getX()
        This method returns the X coordinate of the Tetromino in the Grid.

        the X coordinate of the Tetromino in the Grid

        public int getY()
        This method returns the Y coordinate of the Tetromino in the Grid.

        public Grid getGrid()

        public java.util.ArrayList<Position> getPositions()
        This method returns the Positions the Tetromino occupies in the Grid.
        Returns:
        the Positions the Tetromino occupies in the Grid

      • moveRight

        public boolean moveRight()
        This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space right in the Grid.
        Returns:
        true if the Tetromino moved right, false otherwise

      • moveLeft

        public boolean moveLeft()
        This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space left in the Grid.
        Returns:
        true if the Tetromino moved left, false otherwise

      • moveDown

        public boolean moveDown()
        This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space down in the Grid.
        Returns:
        true if the Tetromino moved down, false otherwise

      • moveCheck

        public boolean moveCheck(Position[] newPositions,
                         int xMovement,
                         int yMovement)
        This method checks whether or not the Tetromino can move to the given new Positions in the Grid.
        Parameters:
        newPositions - - the Positions to check for avaliable space
        xMovement - - how far to move the Tetromino horizontally
        yMovement - - how far to move the Tetromino vertically
        Returns:
        true if the Tetromino can move to the given Positions in the Grid, false otherwise

      • rotate

        public void rotate()
        This method rotates the Tetromino's Positions in the grid based on which orientation it has.

      • removeBlocksFromGrid

        public void removeBlocksFromGrid()
        This method temporarily removes the blocks from the Grid for Grid checking purposes.

      • addBlocksToGrid

        public void addBlocksToGrid()
        This method adds the blocks back to the Grid after Grid checking is complete.

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method renders the Tetromino's sprite on the frame.
        Parameters:
        g - - the Graphics class to render with
